itemDisplayName: Create an Azure Key Vault with default settings
description: Create an Azure Key Vault with default settings that doesn't include any keys, secrets, or certificates and uses the standard pricing tier. Only the person who created the key vault is added to the access policy and authorized to do vault operations. After deployment, you can update the key vault's settings.
summary: A template that creates an Azure Key Vault with default settings that doesn't include any keys, secrets, or certificates and uses the standard pricing tier.
